alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:40PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation with a combination of light snow and light freezing drizzle. Any additional snow accumulation would be under 1 inch. Ice accumulation of a light glaze is not out of the question. Northerly winds only 10 to 20 MPH in most areas. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility below 1 mile at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the early Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
